name: Endless Abyss: Endless Edition
description:
In the land of the continent, an eldritch force bubbles beneath the land, an evil wizard locked away in ages past.  Follow in your knightly duties, confront bandits, solve the mysteries surrounding the prison built for a would be god while gathering your strength and magic for a battle from beyond the endless abyss.

Endless Abyss: Endless Edition is a graphical improvement on the original title released on Xbox Live Indie Games.  This edition works on PC, provided it contains the XNA 3.1 Redistributable (provided below) and the .net framework.

The base game of Star Cross has the following features.

  • Real-time action battle system
  • 2D pixel art graphics
  • 15+ enemies
  • 3+ biomes
  • 10+ skills
  • 2+ hours of gameplay

The Stellar Edition includes a graphical overhaul of the menu designs and character face graphics.  It also contains bugfixes and runs as a full-screen application.
